00029 #ifndef REGRESSIONCHECK_H
00030 #define REGRESSIONCHECK_H
00031 
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include "Verbose.h"
00034 #include "util/Util.h"
00035 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00036 
00041 class RegressionCheck {
00042 
00043 public:
00044  
00046   RegressionCheck() {
00047     m_MaxErrorsReport = 30;
00048     m_CurrentErrorsReported = 0;
00049   }
00050 
00052   virtual ~RegressionCheck() {}
00053 
00059   virtual bool check(std::string &msg) = 0;
00060 
00061 protected:
00070   bool checkMsg(bool condition, const std::string &msg, std::string &summary) {
00071     if(!condition) {
00072       summary += msg;
00073       reportError(msg);
00074     }
00075     return condition;
00076   }
00077 
00083   void reportError(const std::string &err) {
00084     if(m_CurrentErrorsReported++ < m_MaxErrorsReport) {
00085       Verbose::out(1, "Error encountered: " + err);
00086       if(m_CurrentErrorsReported >= m_MaxErrorsReport) {
00087         Verbose::out(1, "Maximum number of errors reported.");
00088       }
00089     }
00090   }
00091 
00097   void setMaxError(int max) {
00098     m_MaxErrorsReport = max;
00099   }
00100 
00111   void checkFloat(float gold, float gen, double eps, bool &success, double &maxDiff, bool log = false) {
00112 
00113       if(!Util::isFinite(gold) || !Util::isFinite(gen)) {
00114         // Allow for case where both inf to not be an error
00115         if(gold == gen)
00116             return;
00117         success = false;
00118         if(log)
00119             reportError("Non-finite floats. gold: '" + ToStr(gold) + "' test: '" + ToStr(gen) + "'");
00120         return;
00121       }
00122       
00123       double diff = fabs(gold - gen);
00124       maxDiff = Max(diff, maxDiff);
00125       if(diff > eps) {
00126         success = false;
00127         if(log)
00128             reportError("Different floats. gold: '" + ToStr(gold) + "' test: '" + ToStr(gen) + "'");
00129         return;
00130       }
00131   }
00132   
00133 private:
00134 
00135   int m_MaxErrorsReport;        
00136   int m_CurrentErrorsReported;  
00137 
00138 };
00139 
00140 
00141 #endif /* REGRESSIONCHECK_H */
